title: Two regions, two cruves part - a

content.description:
Note: Figure not drawn to scale.

The shaded regions R1 and R2 shown above are enclosed by the graphs of f(x)=x2 and g(x)=2x .
content.question: Find the x- and y-coordinates of the three points of intersection of the graphs of f and g.

frqParts.text: Find the x- and y-coordinates of the three points of intersection of the graphs of f and g.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Use appropriate mathematical symbols and notation (e.g., Represent a derivative using ƒ'(x), y', and dy/dx).
